class.name: CSGCapsule2D
class.description: This node allows creating a capsule for use with the 2D CSG system. [b]Performance:[/b] CSG nodes are only intended for prototyping as they have a significant CPU performance cost. Consider baking final CSG operation results into static geometry that replaces the CSG nodes. This can be done using the various [b]Bake[/b] options available in the [b]CSG2D[/b] menu at the top of the 2D editor viewport after selecting a 2D CSG node.

members.member: Number of radial segments on each quarter circle of the capsule.
